message.body: Hey man. Curious, which credit union did you end up going with?
I have an out of state one. Apple federal credit union, but if you find a CU that is part of the credit union national association, you can bank at any c
redit union that belongs to it.
For example, apple is only in Virginia, but I do all of my banking at VIVRA credit union down the street, because they both belong to the credit union na
In Philly, I think I've heard good things about Trumark credit unions

Ok. Cool. Thanks for the info. I've been shopping around for a while. Just need to solidify a my decision on which one to go with. I will look into that national assoc thing. It'll surely give me more branch options.
